# The `NoFolder` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nofolder">NoFolder</a> - Create &quot;constants&quot; (actually, instructions) with no folding. <a href="#details">More...</a>
